benchmark_details.name: MultiDoc2Dial and FaithDial
benchmark_details.overview: This work investigates how to improve faithfulness and accuracy in knowledge-grounded dialogue generation tasks by leveraging reinforcement learning with a novel reward function based on accuracy and faithfulness metrics.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve the faithfulness and accuracy of knowledge-grounded dialogue generation.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The pretraining of better language models is always helpful for this method.

data.size: 21,453 training examples for MultiDoc2Dial, 18,357 for FaithDial.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on how well the generated responses match ground-truth references and relevant knowledge texts.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores in metrics indicate better accuracy and faithfulness of the generated responses.
methodology.baseline_results: T5-PPO-Ours achieved the best performance across the evaluated benchmarks.
methodology.validation: Models were evaluated using empirical experiments on MultiDoc2Dial and FaithDial.
